name: Bitsy Adventure Demo
description:
Controls are old-school dungeon crawling: arrow keys move and turn 90º at a time.

While the LOWREZJAM is reasonably long, I only had around 4 hours of free time so I cooked up a tech demo for a possible old school adventure on the bitsy engine. It might become the basis of bigger, future projects. You get a "jumpscare" in the woods (no sound) and some key and item hunting on a tiny dungeon.

Bitsy by Adam Le Doux; Bitsy3D by Sean S. LeBlanc, Elkie and others; "edit room from dialogue" script by Dana Holdampf; "pause script" by Sean S. LeBlanc.
